ndshapecheck documentation
========================

Welcome to the ndshapecheck docs! Shapecheck is a simple library for checking the shape of
multidimensional arrays, for example numpy arrays or torch tensors. See the contributing
page for information about contributing.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   examples
